title: Osso Buco
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons plain flour', 'Salt and pepper', '6 thick veal shanks', '30g butter', '2 onions, roughly chopped', '2 big carrots, chopped', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, finely sliced', '300ml chicken stock', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '2 tsp fresh oregano or 1 tsp dried oregano', '1 bay leaf']
